page.title: 06SALLY'S DAY.
page.content: Wake at{7.30}wash,dress in school uniform,lay table,take dog for a walk {7.50}have breakfast watching T.V.{8.45 walk to school.{9.00}whistle goes,go in assembly taken by Mr.Connelly our Head teacher.{9.30}mathematics.{l0.35 play time on the field as dry.{10.55 mapping skills ready for our trip to Boggle Hole Youth Hostel.{l2.00 dinnertime I go home for beans,crisps and cake others stay at school for cooked dinner or sandwiches{l.l5 French lesson{2.00}Science-plant identification{2.30}playtime{2.45 science-sea animal identification{3.45 Go home,do homework{4.l5}go to play with friend{5.l5}tea{5.45}Dad home from work,out to play again{7.45}home to watch T.V.& play tapes{9.00}Supper then to bed to read or watch T.V. {l0.00}sleep.
